main :- value.
value :- (object | array | intLit | stringLit).
object :- ["{", repSep(keyValue, ","), "}"].
keyValue :- [stringLit, ": ", value].
intLit :- repSep(digit, <succeed>).
array :- ["[", repSep(value, ","), "]"].
digit :- [0-9].
stringLit :- ["'", repSep([a-z], <succeed>), "'"].
----
text/plain
grammar [0-289]

    ruleName: "main" [0-4]
    rule [8-13]
      ref: "value" [8-13]

    ruleName: "value" [15-20]
    rule [24-61]
      choice [24-61]
        rule [25-31]
          ref: "object" [25-31]
        rule [34-39]
          ref: "array" [34-39]
        rule [42-48]
          ref: "intLit" [42-48]
        rule [51-60]
          ref: "stringLit" [51-60]
  ruleDefn [63-107]
    ruleName: "object" [63-69]
    rule [73-106]
      seq [73-106]
        rule [74-77]
          text: "\"{\"" [74-77]
        rule [79-100]

            rule [86-94]

    "type": "Sequence",

    "type": "Char",

      "type": "Range",
      "from": "0",
      "to": "9"
    }
  },
  "stringLit": {
    "type": "Sequence",
    "items": [

        "type": "Text",
        "value": "'"
